articles.title: Ireland follows Europe's lead as package aimed at surging household costs to be unveiled today - thejournal.ie
articles.description: Tánaiste Leo Varadkar said the cost of living is now the ‘burning issue’ for most people.
articles.content:
THE COST OF living package due to be announced today will have targeted supports as well as a universal benefit for all households, according to Tánaiste Leo Varadkar.

articles.author: Frank Jordans
articles.title: French cave tells new story about Neanderthals, early humans - Phys.org
articles.description: A hillside dwelling overlooking the picturesque Rhone Valley in southern France proved irresistible for our ancestors, attracting both Neanderthals and modern humans long before the latter were thought to have reached that part of Europe, a new study suggests.
